item.title: Using Arrow to Handle Errors and Exceptions in Kotlin
item.description: Overview In functional programming, we deal with exceptions and error Arrow is a FP(functional programming) library in kotlin, which aims to provide an interfaces and abstractions across Kotlin libraries.
